salaryExpectations: LKR 80,000 (Graduate Engineer) to LKR 800,000+ (Engineering Manager/Consultant) per month.
futureOutlook: Mechanical engineers are vital in Sri Lanka's large manufacturing sectors, especially apparel and food processing. There is growing demand for engineers with skills in automation, robotics, and sustainable energy systems (e.g., HVAC). The field provides a strong foundation for moving into senior management roles.
